title: René Schmidheiny
text:
René Schmidheiny (born 4 January 1967 in <a href="Basle">Basle</a>) is a <a href="Switzerland">Swiss</a> <a href="bobsled">bobsled</a>der who competed in the mid-1990s. At the <a href="1994%20Winter%20Olympics">1994 Winter Olympics</a> in <a href="Lillehammer">Lillehammer</a>, he finished seventh in the four-man event.
Prior to being in <a href="bobsleigh">bobsleigh</a>, Schmidheiny also competed in <a href="Athletics%20%28sport%29">athletics</a> as a <a href="Decathlon">decathlete</a>. He competed in the <a href="United%20States">United States</a> for the <a href="University%20of%20Arizona">University of Arizona</a> and still holds the <a href="decathlon">decathlon</a> records at <a href="Sun%20Devil%20Stadium">Sun Devil Stadium</a> in the <a href="discus">discus</a> and <a href="javelin%20throw">javelin throw</a>s .
